ISSUE.TITLE: Import products. Categories and manufacturers should exactly match after importing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now if "categories" (or "manufacturers") column is empty, then existing ones won't be removed. The same is when some category is removed from Excel file after exporting New ones are added, removed ones should be removed

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Cache static content by default for 24 hours (cacheControlMaxAge)
